comments:

problem was resolved by rebooting the machine.

The error means:

    RPC Server Unavailable Failure (800706BA)

    Under certain conditions, you may see an 
    "RPC server unavailable (800706BA)" error message when you are 
    running a client application on Windows NT and a server application 
    on OpenVMS. 

    To correct this error, stop and restart the server application 
    (if you manually started the application); then restart the 
    client application. 

Were you connected remotely a the time?  Could there have been some other 
glitch happening as you tried to start up Eclipse?
Tim, can you please reply?  Does this scenario still occur for you?
I haven't seen the problem again, so I'm happy for this to be closed.
Error not reproducible.  Closing.  If this happens again, please reopen.
